metadata.description: Is Olive Garden open on Christmas or Thanksgiving? 🦃 We've got the complete 2025 holiday schedule and regular hours to help you plan your visit. Check the hours before you go! 👇
metadata.pageGoal: Inform customers about Olive Garden's operating hours during holidays and regular weeks to help them plan their visits.

headline.en: Olive Garden Holiday Hours 2025 & Weekly Schedule 📅
headline.es: Horario de Días Festivos y Semanal de Olive Garden 2025 📅

subheading.en: Is Olive Garden open today? Here's the full scoop on their holiday and regular hours.
subheading.es: ¿Está Olive Garden abierto hoy? Aquí tienes toda la información sobre sus horarios festivos y regulares.

headline.es: Horario de Días Festivos de Olive Garden 2025 🎄

question.en: Is Olive Garden open on Christmas?

answer.en: No, Olive Garden is closed on Christmas Day so the team can spend time with their families.
answer.es: No, Olive Garden está cerrado el día de Navidad para que el equipo pueda pasar tiempo con sus familias.

question.en: Is Olive Garden open on Thanksgiving?
question.es: ¿Olive Garden abre en Acción de Gracias?

answer.en: No, Olive Garden is also closed on Thanksgiving Day.
answer.es: No, Olive Garden también está cerrado el Día de Acción de Gracias.
